description.en:
Nosta is a token bringing together several influencers.
Its goal is to raise funds to invest in a trading algorithm not exposed to the direction of the markets on the parity Nosta / BUSD.
The goal is to offer a monthly return of 5% to 10%.
By investing in the Nosta token, you will participate in this investment vehicle and you will recover the profits generated by the profits of the algorithm by reselling your Nosta tokens whenever you wish.
The goal of the Nosta influencer token is to unite our forces and access a secure funding arbitrage algorithm that you could not have accessed on your own.
